cause.description:
SPUR stands for SPECIAL PEOPLE UNITED TO RIDE. It is located in Middletown, NJ at the Sunnyside Equestrian Center. There are over 10 therapy horses used for lessons for therapy to help children with disabilites, and able bodied children. This program is a great addition to our community, as well as the nation.
SUPPORT SPUR!
1. to provide future generations with this great program
cause.mission: provide horse back riding therapy to children with disabilites
cause.name: SPUR
